46431.「おお…… ツィム！ いいところに来ましたね。\n 防具鍛冶ギルドに依頼した品を:
Oh... Zim! You've come to the right place. The
artisans have come to deliver the items you
requested from the Armorsmith Guild.

46433.「……すごい。\n 素人のボクでもわかる 精巧さ……。\n これだけの品を作ると:
It's amazing. Even I, an amateur, can see the
exquisiteness... It's a wonderful talent to
create such a product.

46434.「よかったですね ツィム。\n 私は 所用を済ませてきますから\n ちゃんと 職:
Good for you, Zim. I'm going to go take care
of some business, so you can thank the
craftsman properly.

46436.「あなたが この品を作った 職人さんですね。\n お名前は…… そう <pc>さ:
You are the craftsman who made this item. Your
name is... so you say <pc>?

46437.「ボクは どうしても知りたかったんです。\n あなたのように才能のある ウデきき:
I really wanted to know. I really wanted to
know what a talented craftsman like yourself
thinks of the current guildmaster.

46438.「どうか マスター・リリムのことを\n 聞かせてくれませんか？ あの人は……\n:
Please, can you tell us about Guildmaster
Lilim? Is he... doing well in the Armorsmith
Guild?<yesno><close>

46439.「なるほど そうですか……。\n では あなたも 何か感じているのですね。: I see... so you are feeling something too.

46440.「そうですか……。\n 言っていることは すこし変わっているけど\n それなりに:
Well... what you're saying is a little
strange, but you're doing reasonably well...

46442.「リリムは…… ボクの実姉です。\n １０年前 父を亡くしたとき\n ボクは 姉:
Lilim is my biological sister, and when my
father died 10 years ago, I lost her and never
saw her again. That was it.

46443.「ずっと 姉を探していて…… ようやく\n それらしき人物が 防具鍛冶ギルドで\:
I've been looking for my sister for a long
time... and I finally found out that she is
the master of the Armorsmith Guild.

46444.「聞けば マスター・リリムは\n 命が 終わる瞬間に生む 炎を使って\n 防具を:
I hear that Guildmaster Lilim is said to make
armor out of the flames that he creates the
moment his life ends....what a thing to say.

46445.「……だとしたら 間違いないでしょう。\n リリムは ボクの姉で…… そうやって:
If that's the case, there's no doubt about it.
Lilim is my sister... and that's how she uses
someone's Life Fire to make armor.

46446.「それだけじゃないっ！\n ボクの推測が正しければ 父さんが死んだのは\n 事故:
That's not all! If I'm right, it wasn't an
accident that killed my father.

46447.「……す すみません 取り乱して。: I'm sorry, I'm a little distracted.

46448.「でも…… もし あなたが\n 防具鍛冶職人を続けるのなら これからも\n 姉の:
But... if you continue as an armorsmith, will
you keep me informed of my sister's condition?

46449.「どうか…… どうか お願いします。\n 今日は 姉のことを聞かせてくれて……\:
Please... please, please. Thank you... for
telling me about my sister today.

46450.「……話は 終わったようですな。\n こんな呼びだし方をしてしまい\n お気を悪:
I think we're done here. I'm sorry if I
offended you by calling you out like this...

46451.「でも ツィムのことは 私が保証しますよ。\n 彼は信頼できる とても優しい若者:
But I can vouch for Zim. He is a trustworthy
and very sweet young man.

46452.「だからこそ 彼に代わって\n 依頼をしてやろうと思ったのです。\n 悩んでいる:
That's why I decided to make the request on
his behalf. I couldn't bear to see him so
distressed...
